events.name: Learn Chef Configuration Management Part 2
events.description:
** Final update - 28th Nov is confirmed. Level 22 BR01 ** 

The future of management and configuration of the Microsoft platform is Desired State Configuration. Chef is a configuration management product that is fully leveraging the DSC platform is important to the DevOps movement. There is some great content at learnchef.io which I have wanted to go through for a while but have yet to schedule in. So I am scheduling the time to do it.If you would like to Learn Chef too, join me for this Meetup. I cannot provide any expertise on Chef whatsoever, but I can provide a room with a big screen, food, uninterrupted time to watch the content and go through the labs as well as others to discuss with and expertise on DSC.If this sounds like something you'd like to do please come along, let's learn Chef and progress our journey to DevOps. This meetup is intended to: • Provide you with time and space to work through the LearnChef.io content on your own machine • Meet and discuss with others on your learning if you would like • Watch a screened Chef & DSC Web recording from Chef's Steven Murawski • Take a look at some Pluralsight content 


I'll be on hand to talk about DSC if you'd like to talk about that, I'll be going through the Chef content myself and look forward to having some good discussion.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: 3D Scan Your Face Session
events.description: Hi!!   We've got another session of face 3D scanning lined up this Saturday at IDA@Labs@ Bugis. Hope to see you all! Cheers Victor
events.location: IDA Labs @ NDC National Design Centre , 111 Middle Road, #03-04 Singapore 188969
